chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The goal of the &SYS_ORG_NAME; Code eXchange Initiative (CodeX) is to transpose and apply the principles of Open Source [XOSP] into our own corporate environment. Establishing collaborative software development and project management practices as one of our core software engineering values will improve the quality of our software and the productivity of our development teams while providing a rich, attractive and cost efficient.
The CodeX initiative is supported by an internal Web site of the same name that is available at http://&SYS_DEFAULT_DOMAIN;/.

The CodeX User Guide was written not only to describe the CodeX features and services; it is also packed with tips and guidelines to help you get the most out of CodeX and manage your project in an optimal way.

We hope that you enjoy working with CodeX. If so, keep talking about the CodeX initiative to fellow programmers, project managers and managers. CodeX users are our best advocates. Also keep in mind that this User Guide is yours and, following source code sharing principles, we welcome your corrections and contributions.
